pr_title: Create game title text field changes border to red if not filled out

timeline.message: Create game title text field changes background to red if not filled out

timeline.bodyHTML:
We try to avoid hardcoding any styles. So basically, we never call setStyle(). Instead, have a look at titleTextField.pseudoClassStateChanged().

Assuming we call the pseudo class invalid, it can then be styled like so:

.game-title-input:invalid {
  -fx-background-color: -bad;
}

... even though I think that a red background will look nasty :-) So I'd rather go with -fx-border-color: -bad
